mapper.select: select m.institution_id, m.agent_id, m.parent_id, i.cn_name as ext5, m1.cn_name as ext6, m2.cn_name as ext7, m.agent_type, m.id,m.cn_name,m.en_name,m.country_type,m.country as country,m.mcc,m.region as region,m.merchant_type,m.group_master_account,m.develop_sales, m.company_regist_number,m.company_validity,m.legal_passport_code,m.legal_passport_validity, co.area_code as country_code,m.institution_adress,m.legal_passport_img,m.institution_contract,m.company_articles,m.business_certificate,m.institution_phone, m.legal_name,m.business_category,m.business_license,m.industry_category,m.merchant_postal_code,m.merchant_email,m.merchant_web_url, m.contact_address,m.contact_people,m.contact_phone,m.audit_status,m.ext7,m.ext6,m.ext5,m.ext4,m.ext3,m.ext2,m.ext1,m.create_time,m.update_time, m.creator,m.modifier,m.remark,m.enabled from merchant_audit m left join institution i on m.institution_id = i.id left join merchant m1 on m.agent_id = m1.id left join merchant m2 on m.parent_id = m2.id left join country co on m.country = co.extend1 and co.language = #{language} left join country c1 on m.region = c1.extend1 and c1.language = #{language} where m.id=#{id}
